name: GitHub
description: A platform for version control and collaboration. GitHub lets developers work together on projects from anywhere in the world.

name: Stack Overflow
description: A public Q&A site for programmers. Find solutions to coding problems and share knowledge with a community of developers.

name: MDN Web Docs
description: Comprehensive documentation for web developers. Includes detailed information on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Web APIs.

name: Figma
description: A collaborative interface design tool that's available in the browser. Create, test, and share designs with your team.

name: ChatGPT
description: An AI language model that can assist with writing, coding, learning, and more through natural conversation.

name: Notion
description: An all-in-one workspace for notes, tasks, wikis, and databases. Organize your work and life in one flexible tool.

name: Product Hunt
description: A platform to discover the latest mobile apps, websites, and technology products. Find daily features and trending tech.

name: Trello
description: A visual tool for organizing your work and life. Trello's boards, lists, and cards help teams manage projects collaboratively.

name: Perplexity AI
description: An AI language model that can assist with various tasks, mostly used due to web browsing capabilities, also can be used without an account.

name: DuckDuckGo
description: Popular search engine that focuses on privacy and anti-data collection.

name: Emalm
description: A neat free video and image upload website, does not require an account.

name: Imgur
description: Well known website for uploading images free and without an account.

name: Discord
description: One of the most popular social media applications, focused towards gamers and community driven audience.

name: AlternativeTo
description: Discover great apps, websites, and tools that are similar to what you're already using.

name: Wolfram Alpha
description: A computational knowledge engine that answers factual queries directly by computing the answer from curated data.

name: Libgen
description: A file-sharing website for scientific journal articles, books, and images.

name: Internet Archive
description: A non-profit library of millions of free books, movies, software, music, websites, and more.

name: Have I Been Pwned
description: Check if your email address has been compromised in a data breach.

name: DeepL
description: An AI-powered translation tool that offers highly accurate and natural-sounding translations.

name: Canva
description: A graphic design platform that makes it easy to create professional-looking visuals.

name: Grammarly
description: An AI-powered writing assistant that helps you write clearly and effectively.

name: Overleaf
description: A collaborative, online LaTeX editor for writing and publishing scientific documents.

name: Radio Garden
description: Explore live radio stations from around the world.

name: CamelCamelCamel
description: Track Amazon prices and get alerts when products go on sale.

name: Remove.bg
description: Automatically remove the background from images.

name: JustWatch
description: Find out where to watch movies and TV shows streaming online.

name: Ninite
description: Download and install multiple Windows programs at once, without any bloatware.

name: ToffeeShare
description: Share files of any size directly from your browser, with no storage limits.

name: PrivNote
description: Send self-destructing messages that disappear after being read.

name: Down for Everyone or Just Me
description: Check if a website is down for everyone or just you.

name: A Soft Murmur
description: Create a relaxing ambiance with customizable ambient sounds.

name: OldMapsOnline
description: View a wide variety of historical maps throughout a large timeline.

name: Hugging Face
description: An AI community platform where you can discover, use, and contribute to thousands of open-source machine learning models and datasets.

name: Midjourney
description: An AI art generator that creates stunning images based on text prompts, accessible through Discord.

name: DALL-E
description: OpenAI's text-to-image AI system that creates realistic images and art from natural language descriptions.

name: RunwayML
description: A creative toolkit for AI-powered video editing, generation, and visual effects.

name: Anthropic Claude
description: An AI coding assistant designed to be helpful, harmless, and honest with capabilities similar to ChatGPT.

name: Copy.ai
description: AI-powered copywriting tool that helps create marketing copy, emails, social media content, and more.

name: Jasper
description: AI content platform for marketing teams to create blog posts, social media, emails, and other content.

name: Synthesia
description: AI video generation platform that creates video content from text, featuring virtual avatars.

name: Descript
description: All-in-one audio and video editing software with AI-powered features like text-based editing and voice cloning.

name: Lumen5
description: AI video creation platform that turns blog posts and text content into engaging videos.

name: Otter.ai
description: AI-powered meeting assistant that records, transcribes, and summarizes conversations in real-time.

name: Krisp
description: AI-powered noise cancellation app that removes background noise during calls and recordings.

name: Notion AI
description: AI writing assistant integrated with Notion that helps draft, edit, summarize, and brainstorm content.

name: Stable Diffusion
description: Open-source AI art generator for creating images from text descriptions.

name: Leonardo.ai
description: AI image generation platform designed specifically for creating game assets and concept art.

name: Murf.ai
description: AI voice generator that creates studio-quality voiceovers with realistic AI voices.

name: ElevenLabs
description: AI voice cloning and text-to-speech platform with highly realistic voices.

name: Gamma
description: AI-powered presentation creation tool that turns your ideas into professional presentations.

name: Fireflies.ai
description: AI meeting assistant that records, transcribes, and analyzes your meetings.

name: Tome
description: AI-powered storytelling format for creating presentations and visual narratives.

name: Gemini
description: Google’s AI chatbot that integrates with Google services and provides contextual responses.

name: Microsoft Copilot
description: Microsoft’s GPT-4 powered chatbot integrated with Bing search for up-to-date information.

name: ChatSonic
description: AI chatbot that can handle real-time data, generating text, images, and more.

name: Codeium
description: AI code completion tool supporting multiple programming languages in popular IDEs.

name: CodeWhisperer
description: Amazon’s AI-driven coding assistant that provides real-time code suggestions.

name: Elicit
description: AI research assistant that helps find relevant papers, summarize them, and generate insights.

name: Kaggle
description: A platform for data science competitions, datasets, and AI-powered notebooks.

name: Magenta
description: Google’s AI research project focusing on music and art generation.

name: NVIDIA Canvas
description: AI-powered painting tool that allows you to sketch simple shapes and turn them into realistic images.

name: Playground AI
description: Tool for creating AI-generated images and artwork from text prompts.

name: Poe
description: Quora’s AI chatbot aggregator offering multiple large language models in one interface.

name: Replika
description: AI companion chatbot designed for friendships, self-improvement, and roleplay interactions.

name: Soundraw
description: AI music composition tool for generating custom, royalty-free music tracks.

name: Phind
description: AI search engine and pair programmer for developers, providing answers with code examples and explanations.

name: Blackbox AI
description: AI coding assistant that helps you find code snippets, generate code, and answer programming questions.

name: Tabnine
description: AI code completion assistant that supports multiple languages and IDEs, improving developer productivity.

name: Suno AI
description: AI music generator that creates songs with vocals and instruments from text prompts.

name: HeyGen
description: AI video platform for creating engaging videos with AI avatars and voice cloning.

name: Pictory
description: AI video generator that automatically creates short, highly-shareable branded videos from your long-form content.

name: Rytr
description: AI writing assistant that helps you create high-quality content for blogs, emails, social media, and more.

name: Civitai
description: A platform for sharing and discovering AI art models, primarily for Stable Diffusion.

name: Veed.io
description: Online video editing platform with a suite of AI-powered tools for easy video creation.

name: Adobe Firefly
description: Adobe's family of creative generative AI models, integrated into Adobe Creative Cloud apps.

name: Clipdrop
description: An ecosystem of AI-powered apps, plugins & resources for all creators, by Stability AI.

name: You.com
description: AI search engine that provides summarized answers and allows users to chat with different AI models.

name: AssemblyAI
description: AI models for speech-to-text, speech understanding, and audio intelligence.
